description: This file is an HTML document that serves as the front-end interface for a database visualizer web application. It provides UI components for selecting databases and tables, displaying table data in a tabular format, and includes embedded JavaScript for dynamic interactions such as fetching database info, handling user selections, and rendering data tables.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, updating the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses database entry to show tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads data for a selected table and renders it.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data in a tabular HTML structure.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates cell HTML based on data type and content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
